summary: Busy workday with moderate stress. Started with a run, stayed focused at work despite workload pressure. Managed cigarette urges well, but couldn't progress on personal project. Ended the day feeling exhausted but reflective.

wins: Reduced cigarette consumption to 4-5 from previous 20+
Went for a run despite late wake-up
Stayed focused through a heavy office workload
losses: No progress on Tutor app due to office demands
ideas: Set micro-goals for Tutor app during weekdays
Continue using creative expression (doodling) as an emotional regulator

goals: Resume Tutor app development with timeboxing
